document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Date: Wed, 14 Oct 2020 18:27:50 +0000 
Hi, 
Just the documents tagged as listed below, please (not the full family). 
Thanks very much, 
From 
Sent: 
Wednesday. 
October 14 2020 12.48 PM 
To 
Cc 
Subject: RE: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Hello, 
For item three on this list. Did you want to produce the full family of documents or just the documents tagged as listed 
below (ex. produce as is, produce as is and confidential, produce as is and highly confidential)? 
Thank you. 
Fro  
Sent: Tuesda October 13 2020 11:17 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Discovery Tasks for Maxwell on Epstein Relativity Databases 
Thanks very much for speaking earlier today. As discussed, we are asking for the following three productions to be 
prepared for the Maxwell case. I've listed those tasks below in the order in which we discussed them, but, as we 
discussed, if you and the vendor believe a different order would be more efficient, please just let me know. 
EFTA00021983

As we've discussed, we need all of these materials to be delivered to 1St. Andrews by the end of October in order to 
meet our discovery deadline. 
Finally, I believhould be sending you a drive containing the scans of boxes of files from the USAO-SDFL. 
We need all of those files loaded into the US v Epstein database on Relativity in a new folder entitled "USAO-SDFL Files," 
ASAP so that we can review them, please. 
Thanks very much, as always for your help, and please do not hesitate to reach out if there are any questions or 
confusion. I'm always happy to chat. 
Thanks so much, 
EFTA00021984
